summary: Most Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block declined on Thursday. Bitcoin was down and trading a bit under $16,800 by market close.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Most mining stocks decline on Thursday
content: Most Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block fell on Thursday.
Bitcoin was down and trading a bit under $16,800 by market close, according to data from TradingView.
BTCUSD Chart by TradingView
